import openpyxl
wb = openpyxl.load_workbook\(r''C:\\Users\\hinan\\Desktop\\excel_kontakte\\test.xlsx'', read_only=True\)
ws = wb.active
print\(''Sheet name:'', ws.title\)
print\(''Rows:'', ws.max_row, ''| Cols:'', ws.max_column\)
print\(\)
for i, row in enumerate\(ws.iter_rows\(values_only=True\)\):
    if i >= 6:
        break
    print\(f''Row {i}: {list\(row\)}''\)
wb.close\(\)

Bash("C:\\Users\\hinan\\Documents\\excel-lead-enrichment\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import openpyxl

src = openpyxl.load_workbook\(r''C:\\Users\\hinan\\Desktop\\excel_kontakte\\test.xlsx''\)
ws_src = src.active

dst = openpyxl.Workbook\(\)
ws_dst = dst.active
ws_dst.title = ws_src.title

# Copy header + first 5 data rows \(skip empty rows\)
copied = 0
for i, row in enumerate\(ws_src.iter_rows\(values_only=True\)\):
    if i == 0:
        ws_dst.append\(list\(row\)\)
        continue
    if any\(cell is not None for cell in row\):
        ws_dst.append\(list\(row\)\)
        copied += 1
        if copied >= 5:
            break

dst.save\(r''C:\\Users\\hinan\\Desktop\\excel_kontakte\\test_5.xlsx''\)
src.close\(\)
dst.close\(\)
print\(f''Created test_5.xlsx with {copied} data rows''\)
")

import httpx, os, json
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(r''C:\\Users\\hinan\\Documents\\excel-lead-enrichment\\.env''\)

# Test Apollo single match
print\(''=== APOLLO SINGLE MATCH ===''\)
r = httpx.post\(
    ''https://api.apollo.io/api/v1/people/match'',
    json={
        ''first_name'': ''Achim'',
        ''last_name'': ''Kitschmann'',
        ''organization_name'': ''OSYPKA'',
        ''reveal_personal_emails'': True,
        ''reveal_phone_number'': True,
        ''webhook_url'': os.environ[''ENRICHMENT_WEBHOOK_URL''],
    },
    headers={
        ''X-Api-Key'': os.environ[''ENRICHMENT_APOLLO_API_KEY''],
        ''Content-Type'': ''application/json'',
        ''Cache-Control'': ''no-cache'',
    },
\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Body: {r.text[:800]}''\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== APOLLO BULK MATCH ===''\)
r = httpx.post\(
    ''https://api.apollo.io/api/v1/people/bulk_match'',
    json={
        ''reveal_personal_emails'': True,
        ''reveal_phone_number'': True,
        ''webhook_url'': os.environ[''ENRICHMENT_WEBHOOK_URL''],
        ''details'': [
            {''first_name'': ''Achim'', ''last_name'': ''Kitschmann'', ''organization_name'': ''OSYPKA''},
        ],
    },
    headers={
        ''X-Api-Key'': os.environ[''ENRICHMENT_APOLLO_API_KEY''],
        ''Content-Type'': ''application/json'',
        ''Cache-Control'': ''no-cache'',
    },
\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Body: {r.text[:800]}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\hinan\\Documents\\excel-lead-enrichment\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import httpx, os, json
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(r''C:\\Users\\hinan\\Documents\\excel-lead-enrichment\\.env''\)

# Test Apollo WITHOUT webhook \(no phone reveal\)
print\(''=== APOLLO SINGLE - NO WEBHOOK ===''\)
r = httpx.post\(
    ''https://api.apollo.io/api/v1/people/match'',
    json={
        ''first_name'': ''Achim'',
        ''last_name'': ''Kitschmann'',
        ''organization_name'': ''OSYPKA'',
        ''reveal_personal_emails'': True,
    },
    headers={
        ''X-Api-Key'': os.environ[''ENRICHMENT_APOLLO_API_KEY''],
        ''Content-Type'': ''application/json'',
        ''Cache-Control'': ''no-cache'',
    },
\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
body = r.json\(\)
if r.status_code == 200 and body.get\(''person''\):
    p = body[''person'']
    print\(f''Name: {p.get\(""first_name""\)} {p.get\(""last_name""\)}''\)
    print\(f''Email: {p.get\(""email""\)}''\)
    print\(f''ID: {p.get\(""id""\)}''\)
    print\(f''Title: {p.get\(""title""\)}''\)
else:
    print\(f''Body: {r.text[:500]}''\)

print\(\)
print\(''Webhook URL from .env:'', os.environ.get\(''ENRICHMENT_WEBHOOK_URL'', ''NOT SET''\)\)
")
